thumb.title: Aliens vs. Predator 2 - COOPERATIVE MOD | FULL PREDATOR CAMPAIGN | AVPUNKNOWN
thumb.description: On the desolate world of LV-1201, the hunt begins. Several Predators descend from the stars not only to hunt but to slaughter swarms of Xenomorphs, and to track down a far more dangerous prey General Rykov, the ruthless leader of the Weyland-Yutani corporate forces. His schemes threaten to tip the balance, and he must be stopped. The question is: can these hunters achieve their goal? This time we’re playing it with friends, @b1kingkenny The AVP2 Co-Op Mod (link’s in the video description if you wanna try it). Grab a drink, pile up the snacks, and buckle in for an hour of absolute chaos aliens, predators, and more fails than a rookie Predator trying to use stealth mode with the cloak turned off lol. This is Aliens vs. Predator 2 Co-Op and it’s EPIC! DOWNLOAD FROM AVPUNKNOWN COOP SITE https://avpunknown.com/avp2coop
